earthquake.success_enable: Earthquake alert has been activated successfully!, you will receive a notification via dm if there is an earthquake in your city!
earthquake.success_disable: The earthquake alert has been successfully turned off, you will not receive a notification if an earthquake occurs in your city!
earthquake.success_set_city:
The city has been successfully set to ``{{city}}``, you will receive a notification if an earthquake occurs in your city!

**Note:** Make sure your city name is written correctly, you will not receive a notification if you enter the wrong/invalid city!

help.description_help1:
Below is a category command, you can see the command by selecting the menu
```You can use bot with (/) / slash command```

**Why do you have to slash commands? why no custom prefix?**
Ok, Based on Discord's policy starting from April 2022 all bots whose servers are above 75 must switch to a slash command, for that we start implementing it from now on.
